name: OpenGuardrails
description: Behavioral anomaly detection for OpenClaw agents.

enabled.description: Enable or disable the guard (default: true)

blockOnRisk.description: Block tool calls when behavioral risk is detected (default: true)

timeoutMs.description: Timeout for cloud assessment in milliseconds (default: 60000)

agentName.description: Agent name used during registration (default: OpenClaw Agent)

coreUrl.description: Core API URL — registration and behavioral detection (default: https://www.openguardrails.com/core)

dashboardUrl.description: Dashboard URL for observation reporting (default: https://www.openguardrails.com/dashboard). Self-hosted users should change to local address.

dashboardSessionToken.description: Dashboard session token (optional — falls back to Core API key)

enabled.label: Enable Guard
enabled.help: Enable or disable behavioral anomaly detection

blockOnRisk.label: Block on Risk
blockOnRisk.help: Block tool calls when behavioral risk is detected

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Your API key. Leave blank for automatic registration on first use.

agentName.label: Agent Name
agentName.help: Name shown in the OpenGuardrails dashboard for this agent.

coreUrl.label: Core URL
coreUrl.help: Core API endpoint (default: https://www.openguardrails.com/core). Self-hosted users should set to local address (e.g. http://localhost:3002).

dashboardUrl.label: Dashboard URL
dashboardUrl.help: URL of the OpenGuardrails dashboard for reporting tool call observations (default: https://www.openguardrails.com/dashboard). Self-hosted users should set to local address.

dashboardSessionToken.label: Dashboard Token
dashboardSessionToken.help: Session token for dashboard auth. Leave blank to auto-use your Core API key.
